components.name: TableComponent
components.templateData:
<app-table-header class="mb-3 block"/>
@for (item of items(); track item) {
  <app-table-row [item]="item" class="mb-3 block" (click)="updateItem.emit(item)"/>
}
<app-table-paginator/>

variables.name: appConfig
icons
variables.defaultValue: ICONS_PATHS.map(({ name, paths}) => ({ name: name as IconName, paths }))

variables.name: initialState
variables.defaultValue:
{
  users: [],
  isLoading: false,
  error: null,
  currentPage: 0,
  usersPerPage: 5,
  sort: 'asc',
  sortField: 'name',
  filter: '',
  view: 'list'
}
